storyInfo:
After beating Utage, she explains her ridiculous reasoning for the attack. Gavial finds Inam's description of Tomimi somewhat moving.
The strengthened team moves ever onward.

attributes.content: Alright, so why did you charge this place with those Archosauria again?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Well, I saw a village here, and I just thought it'd be fun to start a fight.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: ...I guess that's our Utage. Yer like a whole 'nother gal in a fight.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Aww, I'm sorry...
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: But how did you even manage to round up these guys without speaking their language?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Honestly, I don't really know.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Urgh, my nails are ruined. I'm so pissed.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: And just where the hell did my nail kit go? Now I'm twice as pissed.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: And I'm hella gross and sweaty after that fight. Plus, the air here is so humid, my clothes are totally soaked. Now I'm three times as pissed.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: And I'm, like, just walking around. Why do these Archosauria people keep coming up to me, picking fights? Now I'm four times as pissed.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: And I only tagged along 'cause I heard this would be a nice place for a vacation. This is totally not a vacation spot!
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Hmm? Is someone sneaking up on me? Are those... Archosauria?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Then I beat up all the sneaky dudes.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: And then some more of them came, so I beat all of them up.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: And somehow they all started to, like, worship me for some reason.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Oh, I see. They probably thought you were some kind of exotic animal. After all, no one from around here looks like you.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Huh?! Are you blind? How do you mistake a cutie like me for an animal?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Uh, well, to tell you the truth, you probably do look kinda like a freak to the Archosauria.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Also, I spotted the Great Wood Tribe's leader among your people, so I asked him. Apparently you're their leader now.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: I'm what?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Basically, you defeated the tribe's leader, and they're following you around because they look up to you as their leader now.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Huh? They don't even understand a word I'm saying!  I thought they were just tagging along for fun!
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: That's what happens when you're strong enough here.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: What should I do, Doctor...?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.options: It's your mess. Figure it out yourself.;......;Might as well stick around and lead them.

attributes.content: Nnng... so mean!
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Nng... Don't look at me like that, Doctor.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: I didn't mean to...
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Eh? I don't wanna! Life without TV and AC? You might as well just kill me.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Whatever, we found you and Croissant. Now we just need to look for Blaze.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Blaze is probably fine. I can't imagine anything slowing her down.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Me neither. Oh, yeah, Baws, what's the plan now? We goin' to the Temple fer that ceremony Gavial was talkin' about?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Oh, right, you two haven't heard yet. Doctor, why don't you tell them?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Explain the situation to Utage and Croissant.
Uh huh. Alrighty then, so we gon' be lookin' fer this Zumama to get yer engine back?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: That's right.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Eh? You mean the ceremony's over already?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Yep.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Then what did I even come here for?
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Whatever, it doesn't sound like something I'd care about anyway.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Also, Gavial, I thought you said this was a vacation spot!
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Huh? You don't think this place is great?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Well, actually, I guess, yeah, it's great!
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: But, like, nothing here screams 'vacation!'
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: What screams 'vacation' to you?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Like, beaches, oceans, parasols, and ice cream!
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: I even got myself a new swimsuit! I've been wearing it underneath my outfit since before we left!
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Eh, and here I tagged along just 'cause I got nothin' else to do...
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Uh, I never said there's anything like that around here.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Didn't you say we were gonna play in the water?!
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Well yeah, that we can do. There's a huge waterfall deep in the rainforest.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: And since we're heading to Zumama's tribe, we'll pass by the waterfall for sure.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hell, I brought my swimsuit too. I just haven't taken it out yet.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Really? Awesome!
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Well, it looks like you found who you're looking for.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Yeah, Inam, thanks to you.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: No problem.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Oh I just remembered, where's Tomimi? I thought she was supposed to be with you guys.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: No idea. I think she had something else to take care of. We'll group up with her later.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Alright, bring her these books, then, will you?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: What do we have here? 'City Beauty', 'Mastering Corporate Management in 100 Days', 'How to Become a Fashion Expert'...
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: These are some weird titles!
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: She's been learning Sargonian and what life in the outside world is like. After I taught her the basics, of course.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Hm, I can't imagine these books help much with her Sargonian.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: You're right. But that's really how she learned it. Letter by letter, word by word.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: It may not be the best material to learn from, but it was more painful to see her not having a clue where to start.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: That's also why I decided to teach her Sargonian.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: You know, Gavial, she's really working hard to get to where you are.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: ...You don't need to tell me. I know.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: But well, I don't know that much about what it's like outside either. Besides, I can only bring so many books with me, so I don't really know whether she's learning anything useful from them, haha.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: ...No wonder there's always something weird about her.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hang on, don't tell me you're the one who taught Zumama Sargonian too.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Nope. I'm pretty curious about that myself. She did have me find her books on machinery, but it was like she just picked up Sargonian out of nowhere.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: And she's even teaching it to her tribe.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: ...Doctor, what do you think?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.options: She's quite ambitious.;......;How much for this rock?

attributes.content: You think so too, huh?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: You want me to think about it myself, huh?
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Hm, alright. I'll settle this my way.
attributes.name: Gavial

attributes.content: Since you're a new customer, I'll let you have it for 300 dinar.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: That's the look of a Doctor who just doesn't care.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Eh? T'ain't nothin' wrong with her teachin' Sargonian. If'n people here could talk with folks out there, they'd live a lot better.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Maybe. The way I think about it, compared to your supposedly much better lives, I think our way of life out here is satisfying enough.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: I don't think you city folks would understand, though.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: That so...?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Oh, I think I get it! I mean, I lived in the countryside back in Higashi, too.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: Eh? I took you for a city girl, what with how trendy you are.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Nope, this is just the kinda stuff I like.
attributes.name: Utage

attributes.content: *Yawn*... I'm tired... time for a nap.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Here at our tribe, anything we leave out's for trade. If something catches your eye, have Gavial translate for you.
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Inam

attributes.options: I've got a favor to ask you, too.
